00031    StructureFactor::StructureFactor(System& system) 
00032     : SystemDiagnostic<System>(system),
00033       isInitialized_(false)
00034    {}
00035 
00036    StructureFactor::~StructureFactor()

00040    void StructureFactor::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00041    {
00042 
00043       // Read interval and parameters for AutoCorrArray
00044       //SystemDiagnostic<System>::readParam(in);
00045       readInterval(in);
00046       readOutputFileName(in);
00047 
00048       nAtomType_ = system().simulation().nAtomType();
00049 
00050       read<int>(in, "nMode", nMode_);
00051       modes_.allocate(nMode_, nAtomType_);
00052       readDMatrix<double>(in, "modes", modes_, nMode_, nAtomType_);
00053 
00054       read<int>(in, "nWave", nWave_);
00055       waveIntVectors_.allocate(nWave_);
00056       readDArray<IntVector>(in, "waveIntVectors", waveIntVectors_, nWave_);
00057 
00058       waveVectors_.allocate(nWave_);
00059       fourierModes_.allocate(nWave_, nMode_);
00060       structureFactors_.allocate(nWave_, nMode_);
00061 
00062       maximumValue_.allocate(Samples);
00063       maximumWaveIntVector_.allocate(Samples);
00064       maximumQ_.allocate(Samples);
00065 
00066       isInitialized_ = true;
00067    }
00068 
00069    /*
00070    * Clear accumulators.
00071    */
00072    void StructureFactor::setup() 
00073    {
00074       if (!isInitialized_) {
00075          UTIL_THROW("Error: object is not initialized");
00076       }
00077       assert (nWave_ > 0);
00078       assert (nMode_ > 0);
00079 
00080       // Clear accumulators
00081       int i, j;
00082       for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00083          for (j = 0; j < nMode_; ++j) {
00084             structureFactors_(i, j) = 0.0;
00085          }
00086       }
00087 
00088       nSample_ = 0;
00089    }
00090  
00092    void StructureFactor::sample(long iStep) 
00093    {
00094       if (isAtInterval(iStep))  {
00095          maximumValue_[nSample_] = 0.0;
00096 
00097          Vector  position;
00098          std::complex<double>  expFactor;
00099          double  product;
00100          System::ConstMoleculeIterator  molIter;
00101          Molecule::ConstAtomIterator  atomIter;
00102          int  nSpecies, iSpecies, typeId, i, j;
00103 
00104          makeWaveVectors();
00105 
00106          // Set all Fourier modes to zero
00107          for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00108             for (j = 0; j < nMode_; ++j) {
00109                fourierModes_(i, j) = std::complex<double>(0.0, 0.0);
00110             }
00111          }
00112  
00113          // Loop over all atoms
00114          nSpecies = system().simulation().nSpecies();
00115          for (iSpecies = 0; iSpecies < nSpecies; ++iSpecies) {
00116             system().begin(iSpecies, molIter); 
00117             for ( ; molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00118                molIter->begin(atomIter); 
00119                for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00120                   position = atomIter->position();
00121                   typeId   = atomIter->typeId();
00122  
00123         // Loop over wavevectors
00124                   for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00125                
00126                      product = position.dot(waveVectors_[i]);
00127                      expFactor = exp( product*Constants::Im );
00128                      for (j = 0; j < nMode_; ++j) {
00129                         fourierModes_(i, j) += modes_(j, typeId)*expFactor;
00130                      }
00131        
00132                   }
00133   
00134                }
00135             }
00136 
00137          }
00138 
00139          // Increment structure factors
00140          double volume = system().boundary().volume();
00141          double norm;
00142          for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00143             for (j = 0; j < nMode_; ++j) {
00144                norm = std::norm(fourierModes_(i, j));
00145                if (norm/volume >= maximumValue_[nSample_]) {
00146                   maximumValue_[nSample_] = norm/volume;
00147                   maximumWaveIntVector_[nSample_] = waveIntVectors_[i];
00148                   maximumQ_[nSample_] = waveVectors_[i].abs();
00149                }
00150                structureFactors_(i, j) += norm/volume;
00151             }
00152          }
00153 
00154          ++nSample_;
00155 
00156       }
00157 
00158    }
00159 
00163    void StructureFactor::makeWaveVectors() 
00164    {
00165       Vector    dWave;
00166       Boundary* boundaryPtr = &system().boundary();
00167       int       i, j;
00168 
00169       // Calculate wavevectors
00170       for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00171          waveVectors_[i] = Vector::Zero;
00172          for (j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00173             dWave  = boundaryPtr->reciprocalBasisVector(j);
00174             dWave *= waveIntVectors_[i][j];
00175             waveVectors_[i] += dWave;
00176             //std::cout << waveVectors_[i] << std::endl;
00177          }
00178       }
00179    }
00180 
00181    void StructureFactor::output() 
00182    {
00183       // Echo parameters to a log file
00184       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".prm"), outputFile_);
00185       writeParam(outputFile_);
00186       outputFile_.close();
00187 
00188       // Output structure factors to one file
00189       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00190       double      value;
00191       int         i, j, k;
00192       for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00193          for (k = 0; k < Dimension; ++k) {
00194             outputFile_ << Int(waveIntVectors_[i][k], 5);
00195          }
00196          outputFile_ << Dbl(waveVectors_[i].abs(), 20, 8);
00197          for (j = 0; j < nMode_; ++j) {
00198             value = structureFactors_(i, j)/double(nSample_);
00199             outputFile_ << Dbl(value, 18, 8);
00200          }
00201          outputFile_ << std::endl;
00202       }
00203       outputFile_.close();
00204 
00205       // Outputs history of maximum structure factors
00206       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName("_max.dat"), outputFile_);
00207       for (int i = 0; i < nSample_; ++i) {
00208          outputFile_ << maximumWaveIntVector_[i];
00209          outputFile_ << Dbl(maximumQ_[i], 20, 8);
00210          outputFile_ << Dbl(maximumValue_[i], 20, 8);
00211          outputFile_ << std::endl;
00212       }
00213       outputFile_.close();
00214 
00215       #if 0
00216       // Output each structure factor to a separate file
00217       std::string suffix;
00218       int         typeId;
00219       for (j = 0; j < nMode_; ++j) {
00220 
00221          // Construct file suffix for this structure factor
00222          suffix = std::string(".");
00223          suffix += toString(j);
00224          suffix += std::string(".dat");
00225 
00226          fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(suffix), outputFile_);
00227 
00228          // Loop over waves to output structure factor
00229          for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00230             for (k = 0; k < Dimension; ++k) {
00231                outputFile_ << Int(waveIntVectors_[i][k], 5);
00232             }
00233             outputFile_ << Dbl(waveVectors_[i].abs(), 20, 8);
00234             value = structureFactors_(i, j)/double(nSample_);
00235             outputFile_ << Dbl(value, 20, 8);
00236             outputFile_ << std::endl;
00237          }
00238 
00239          outputFile_.close();
00240       }
00241       #endif
00242 
00243    }
